title: 22: How to Fail at Flirting
itunes:title: How to Fail at Flirting
description: Happy February! In this new episode of The Readheads, the girls are recapping and discussing How to Fail at Flirting by Denise Williams and spoiler alert: 3 out of 4 of them loved it! In this episode they answer all of your questions about the book and discuss some of the biggest takeaways and lessons learned in this book. They're sharing how this book made them see themselves and what elements of the book they enjoyed most. Stay tuned till the end to hear a very exciting MERCH UPDATE! The next book is Becky's choice and she chose The Four Winds by Kristin Hannah. Follow @thereadheads on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/thereadheads/ Join our Facebook group: https://www.facebook.com/groups/thereadheads/ Submit a question or comment to us at thereadheadsbookclub@gmail.com The overall Readheads Rating for How to Fail at Flirting is 3.525 stars.
